# Replication Materials for
## "When police pull back: Neighborhood-level effects of de-policing on violent and property crime"

Head over to the Harvard Dataverse for the data and code needed to replicate the analyses in this article. [[link](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/HNFQSP)]

Be sure to consult the [readme.txt](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/file.xhtml?fileId=8141583&version=1.1) file first. 

### Article citation: 

Nix, J., Huff, J., Wolfe, S., Pyrooz, D., & Mourtgos, S. (2024). When police pull back: Neighborhood-level effects of de-policing on violent and property crime. *Criminology*, 62(1), 156-171.

### Replication materials citation: 

Nix, Justin; Huff, Jessica; Wolfe, Scott; Pyrooz, David; Mourtgos, Scott, 2024, "Replication Data for: When police pull back: Neighborhood-level effects of de-policing on violent and property crime", https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/HNFQSP, Harvard Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:Bd/JZLuyRlAkv209chwcog== [fileUNF]
